entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
